doc.field: Series I. Cultural, Social and Academic Organizations
Series I. Cultural, Social and Academic Organizations
Subseries IC: Irish American Cultural Institute (IACI)
Subseries IC: Irish American Cultural Institute (IACI)

This subseries consists of materials concerning the Irish American Cultural Institute (founded in St. Paul, Minnesota in 1962) during the period in which O'Malley was directly involved in the organization (1967-1981). Materials relate to the organization's Irish Fortnight Series of lectures in New York which brought over speakers from Ireland to discuss a variety of cultural topics.
